3.name: Narration
3.text:
After respectfully burying the remains of the
golden dragon, the female adventurer headed
towards the towering mountain near the village,
carrying an egg.

4.name: Narration
4.text:
The female adventurer arranged for the villagers
to transport the necessary materials and food, and
prepared to hatch the dragon's egg.

5.name: Narration
5.text:
In the meantime, she continued to search through
various documents, supplementing the lacking
knowledge about dragon hatching.

7.name: Eni-sensei
7.text:
"It is said that golden dragons prefer to make
their nests in places with clear air, such as high
mountains, ruins, and behind waterfalls... This
location should be more than adequate."

8.name: Eni-sensei
8.text:
"However, I have heard from experts that golden
dragons warm their eggs by placing them in fire or
lava..."

9.name: Eni-sensei
9.text:
"I mean... the artwork is quite terrible, isn't
it?"

10.name: Eni-sensei
10.text:
"I don't think it's wrong, but it gives off this
strange feeling as if we're cooking the egg, which
even makes me feel a weird sense of guilt."

11.name: Eni-sensei
11.text:
"The egg itself seems to be progressing well with
this, so it looks like it will hatch soon. Let's
pray for a safe hatching..."

19.name: Eni-sensei
19.text:
"I heard that if a dragon egg is taken from its
nest and raised by hands other than a dragon's,
the chances of it hatching safely are low. I was
really worried about it, but thankfully it turned
out to be needless anxiety."

21.name: Eni-sensei
21.text:
"As for the name... let's see. In the language of
dragons, it's 'Solreguiania'. The immortal sun."

22.name: Eni-sensei
22.text:
"In our language, it's 'Sol'. Let's name her
that."

23.name: Eni-sensei
23.text:
"Nice to meet you, Gold Dragon (Gold Dragon
Wyrmling) Sol. I am your teacher."

29.name: Sol
29.text:
"Sensei! Just as you instructed, I went and hunted
a deer!"

30.name: Eni-sensei
30.text:
"Excellent. Sol, it seems you were able to do it
on your own."

31.name: Sol
31.text:
"I can do this much! I'm already an adult... or
should I say, an adult dragon?"

32.name: Eni-sensei
32.text:
"Good grief. If you ask me, you're still just a
fledgling. ...Although I do feel like some parts
of your body have grown quite well. It's impudent
to be getting close to my size already."

34.name: Eni-sensei
34.text:
"No, it's nothing. First, let's have a meal. Let's
give thanks to the deer you hunted and partake in
it."

38.name: Eni-sensei
38.text:
"As always, this child eats an incredible amount.
It reminds me that she is a dragon."

39.name: Eni-sensei
39.text:
"Well then... leaving that aside... Sol. If you
claim to be a full-fledged adult, it's about time
you prove it on your own."

41.name: Eni-sensei
41.text:
"Yes, this is the graduation exam you've been
wishing for... the day you leave the nest. If you
achieve this, you will be a full-fledged adult.
You will stand alone as a splendid dragon."

43.name: Eni-sensei
43.text:
"For the past two years, I've hammered in
everything you need. Arithmetic, knowledge of
human society, military science, geography,
monster studies, herbalism..."

44.name: Eni-sensei
44.text:
"Well, I don't have an aptitude for magic, so I
could only teach the basics of magic and miracles.
I do regret that."

45.name: Sol
45.text: "It was really fun but also tough!!"

46.name: Eni-sensei
46.text:
"As expected of a golden dragon, you are a quick
learner and an excellent student. I was able to
have a very easy time."

47.name: Eni-sensei
47.text:
"My previous student had a very good memory and
was quick on the uptake. Well, that's beside the
point."

48.name: Eni-sensei
48.text:
"If Sol has learned and mastered those things
properly, I believe she can achieve this exam
without any problems. You'll be fine, won't you?"

49.name: Sol
49.text:
"Y-Yes!! I will definitely live up to Sensei's
expectations!! I'll do my best!"

50.name: Eni-sensei
50.text:
"Excellent. Then, please transform into a dragon
and carry me."

51.name: Sol
51.text: "Huh? Are you coming with me, Sensei?"

52.name: Eni-sensei
52.text: "Of course. Who do you think will be grading Sol?"

53.name: Eni-sensei
53.text:
"Also, since there may be some danger involved, I
will accompany you just in case. I'll only be
lending a hand, though."
